metadata.name: Pink sunshine
metadata.description:
The winner will open the only picture on Foundation , you will have :
- Original size of the picture (The picture is unique)
- The auction winner will be asked to add a landscape painting with my painting style.

The 2nd and 3rd place bidders will be asked to paint a simple watercolor portrait with my style.

You can check out my drawing style on Deviantart. Wish you happy auction and please support my drawing work, Thank you all!!!
